Localization.Title: Slipping Away
Localization.Text:
Prudence tells you to bring Sm√©agol along with you. Should he be caught by Orcs again, you fear the enemy would come to know one of its prisoners to be a person of no small significance. 

Having twice escaped pursuit, you cautiously approach the ruined structure to study the disposition of your foe. The decayed ruin seems to have been a signal tower of old, now serving as a haunt of evil things.
